summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Affiliate Management module including backend APIs and frontend functionality. Backend seeding, CRUD operations, and data retrieval working well. Frontend navigation, tabs, and create dialog functioning correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Create tracking link requires 'name' field but test payload missing it
minor_bugs.impact: 422 validation error when creating tracking links

ui_bugs.issue: Partners table shows empty despite seeded data in backend
Dropdown selection has overlay interception issues

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not displaying seeded affiliate data from backend

passed_tests: Backend: Seed affiliate data (2 affiliates created)
Backend: Get affiliate offers (1 offer found: TR Welcome CPA - $50)
Backend: Get tracking links, conversions, payouts, creatives (APIs working)
Frontend: Navigate to Affiliate Program page
Frontend: Tab navigation (Partners, Offers, Tracking, Payouts, Reports)
Frontend: Offers tab shows 2 offer rows with correct data
Frontend: Payouts tab shows 1 payout row
Frontend: Create Partner dialog opens and form fields work
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend-backend integration: Partners table not displaying seeded affiliate data. Check API call in AffiliateManagement.jsx fetchData method. Also fix tracking link creation by adding required 'name' field to TrackingLink model.
